name: Greeneum Network
description: Greeneum develop decentralised application fo the renewable energy market and GREEN tokens which are minted for renewable energy generation. It allow energy producers to connect their asset to the blockchain and allows access to Greeneum Platform and to Distributed Financial Applications (Defi) allowing solar and renewable energy producers and consumers to trade their energy and their with each other using blockchain and machine learning. Greeneum token also allow our members to get access to our micro-grids and solar energy solutions and services. Greeneum has affiliates that are part of the decentralised model allows individuals and companies to be involved in the Greeneum network development.
